Class SingleListBox

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
HasAllFocusHandlers, HasAllKeyHandlers, HasAllMouseHandlers, HasBlurHandlers, HasChangeHandlers, HasClickHandlers, HasFocusHandlers, HasKeyDownHandlers, HasKeyPressHandlers, HasKeyUpHandlers, HasMouseDownHandlers, HasMouseMoveHandlers, HasMouseOutHandlers, HasMouseOverHandlers, HasMouseUpHandlers, HasMouseWheelHandlers, HasValueChangeHandlers<java.lang.String>, HasHandlers, EventListener, Focusable, HasFocus, HasName, HasValue<java.lang.String>, SourcesChangeEvents, SourcesClickEvents, SourcesFocusEvents, SourcesKeyboardEvents, SourcesMouseEvents
public class SingleListBox
extends ListBox
implements HasValue<java.lang.String>

A subclass of ListBox representing a single select pulldown and implementing HasValue. It listens to its own ChangeEvent and fires a ValueChangeEvent.

Method Detail

getAddMissingValue

public boolean getAddMissingValue()
Gets the current setting for add missing value.

Returns:
returns true if missing values will be added to the ListBox when setValue is called.

setAddMissingValue

public void setAddMissingValue(boolean addMissingValue)
Sets the current setting for add missing value.

Parameters:
addMissingValue - If true, when setValue is called, if the item cannot be found in the list, it will be added automatically to the end of the list.

getValue

findValueIndex

public int findValueIndex(java.lang.String value)
Finds the index of the specified value.

Parameters:
value - the value to find
Returns:
returns the index of the value or -1 if the value was not found in the ListBox
